column6: When the Vulture steals a sacred African mask, Spider-Man isn't the only one hot on his trail. Kraven the Hunter's in town, and he's gonna make sure that mask ends up right where it belongs--whether Spidey and the Vulture like it or not!
column8: | colorist:Guru-eFX | penciller (cover):Tony Daniel | inker:Norman Lee | writer:Sean McKeever | penciller:Patrick Scherberger
